lead_paragraph: Alexander F. Stern has been named as the chief of the financial advisory business, and Matthieu Pigasse will serve as global head of mergers and acquisitions.

headline.main: Lazard Names New Heads of Financial Advisory and M.&A.

snippet: Alexander F. Stern has been named as the chief of the financial advisory business, and Matthieu Pigasse will serve as global head of mergers and acquisitions.
abstract: Lazard names Alexander F Stern as chief executive of its financial advisory group; names Matthieu Pigasse as new global head of mergers and acquisition and sovereign advisory business.
